lead_paragraph: Eight days after wearing a green elf suit and hat to entertain children alongside pitcher Steven Matz’s Santa Claus at Citi Field, Mets outfielder Kirk Nieuwenhuis was claimed off waivers by the Milwaukee Brewers.

headline.main: Another Mets Elf Is Off the Team
headline.print_headline: Another Mets Elf Is Off the Team

snippet: Eight days after wearing a green elf suit and hat to entertain children alongside pitcher Steven Matz’s Santa Claus at Citi Field, Mets outfielder Kirk Nieuwenhuis was claimed off waivers by the Milwaukee Brewers.
